changeSet.author: CONNECT_APP
changeSet.sql: update SUPPORTED_AFFILIATE set COUNTRY_ID = (SELECT ID FROM COUNTRY WHERE short_name = 'hungary') where SHORT_NAME='autonet-hungary' update SUPPORTED_AFFILIATE set COUNTRY_ID = (SELECT ID FROM COUNTRY WHERE short_name = 'romania') where SHORT_NAME='autonet-romania' update SUPPORTED_AFFILIATE set COUNTRY_ID = (SELECT ID FROM COUNTRY WHERE short_name = 'slovenia') where SHORT_NAME='autonet-slovenia' update SUPPORTED_AFFILIATE set COUNTRY_ID = (SELECT ID FROM COUNTRY WHERE short_name = 'slovakia') where SHORT_NAME='autonet-slovakia'
